document.write('<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://gist.github.com/stylesheets/gist/embed.css"/>')





document.write('<div id=\"gist-318945\" class=\"gist\">\n  \n  \n    \n            \n            \n            \n            \n\n      <div class=\"gist-file\">\n        <div class=\"gist-data gist-syntax\">\n          \n          \n          \n            <div class=\"gist-highlight\"><pre><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC1\">location / {<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC2\">proxy_set_header  X-Real-IP  $remote_addr;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC3\">proxy_set_header  X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC4\">proxy_set_header Host $http_host;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC5\">proxy_redirect false;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC6\">if (-f $request_filename/index.html) {<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC7\">rewrite (.*) $1/index.html break;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC8\">}<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC9\">if (-f $request_filename.html) {<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC10\">rewrite (.*) $1.html break;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC11\">}<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC12\">if (!-f $request_filename) {<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC13\">proxy_pass http://give_proxy_a_name;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC14\">break;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC15\">}<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC16\">} <\/div><\/pre><\/div>\n          \n        <\/div>\n\n        <div class=\"gist-meta\">\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/raw/318945/6c712c0f28c9c4ba397746f7f32999ae0eb7b0ee/gistfile4.txt\" style=\"float:right;\">view raw<\/a>\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/318945#file_gistfile4.txt\" style=\"float:right;margin-right:10px;color:#666\">gistfile4.txt<\/a>\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/318945\">This Gist<\/a> brought to you by <a href=\"http://github.com\">GitHub<\/a>.\n        <\/div>\n      <\/div>\n    \n            \n            \n            \n            \n  \n<\/div>\n')
